ai-patthana14.16:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma ladies that are difficult for the living, etc.,
ai-patthana14.16:1.1_1: Excellent teaching gives rise to the defilement and the defilement. And for these reasons there is a cause or reason for the sake of defilement.
ai-patthana14.16:1.1_2: nor for the sake of restraint and defilement, and for the sake of defilement and for the sake of defilement, and for the sake of a cause or reason.
ai-patthana14.16:2.1_0: Or else there is no cause or condition for the sake of defilement. ...
ai-patthana14.16:3.1_0: Among the defilement and enjoyment, but not for three reasons. ...
ai-patthana14.16:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
